import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function LeftSideBar() { const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const returnHome = () => { navigate('/'); }; return (
NA
